pkgmetadata.longdescription: Download and Run Cargo, the Rust Package Manager // Help is provided to run 'Cargo' https://doc.rust-lang.org/cargo/ (the 'Rust' https://www.rust-lang.org/ package manager). Other packages based on Rust can declare 'LinkingTo: cargo' in their DESCRIPTION file and then use Cargo during the installation of their source package.
